post.body: It's true. All tourists in Times Square on New Years eve. It's insane!
Clever and entertaining video. Two thumbs up!
Congrats, 108 is killer! I hate to spoil the party, but where's the vid?
My heartfelt condolences to you and your family.
Good luck tomorrow! Record it on video and post it online!
Week five day two completed. Good luck on 12/23! You're my hero dude!
Watch ABC News Nightline NOW! Too much plastic in the oceans. BTW, I edited the show open!
500 push ups! Set my watch timer for 20 min. (Three sets per hour) .35 40 40 40 40 41 42 43 44 45 45 45 Done while at work today.
Late snack: 1 cup chopped pineapple, blueberries, strawberries, grapes, and a dollop of low fat cottage cheese. I could eat 5 more of these!
Took a drive to show my kids where I grew up. The 4 miles I used to walk to school was actually less than a mile. Things were bigger then!
Going to NYC for the day. Hope the traffic is light.
Meal number five today, IsaLean protein shake. Tastes too good to be so good for you. Chocolate is killer!
Sharing my Top 10 Tips for a healthy 2009. http://www.mybodybasic.isagenix.com
Sitting in for a friend at my old job at at ABC News. Just edited the show open for Nightline. Done an hour ahead of time. Wahoo!
I am honored to be following (and followed by) @susynandfolsom, @amtrepreneur, @jamiesheetz, @helenabbott. Thank you and Happy Holidays!
My kids have a half-day of school today and then Winter break begins. I love this time of the year. The house will be noisy!
Life isn't perfect, but some moments are.
Just recorded a video standup in my backyard with my little Flip cam. It feels like zero degrees. Brrrrrrrrrrrr! I'm glad to be back inside.
Stability ball boot camp circuit workout. Check it out for home, gym, or group training. http://tinyurl.com/7vpt4w
Chillin at home in cold, wet, sleeting NJ with my wife and kids. We are warm and cozy inside!
